name: odin
title: ODIN
description: Retrieves emergency alarms from Online Dataregistrerings- og Indberetningssystem (ODIN), a system by The Danish Emergency Management Agency (DEMA), through 'www.odin.dk/112puls'.
author: aamoussa97

commands.name: odin-alarms
commands.title: Latest Alarms
commands.subtitle: ODIN
commands.description: Retrieves the latest 20 emergency alarms from ODIN, sorted based on time received.
